articles.description: One of the horses lost a shoe during the incident
articles.content:
A smoke grenade was reportedly thrown at police horses ahead of Preston North End's clash with Lancashire rivals Blackpool.
The two sets of fans were being kept apart by a heavy police presence arou… [+1717 chars]
